meanings.definition: A compound containing iodine that is used as a disinfectant.
meanings.sent1: The iodophor effectively killed the germs on the surface.
meanings.sent2: The hospital used an iodophor to clean the operating room.
meanings.sent3: The iodophor walked into the room, waving its disinfecting wand.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an iodophor, cleansing all negativity around her.
meanings.sent5: The smell of iodophor filled the air, promising a germ-free environment.

meanings.definition: A substance that is used to sterilize equipment in brewing and winemaking.
meanings.sent1: The brewery relied on iodophor to keep their equipment clean.
meanings.sent2: Winemakers use iodophor to ensure their wine is free from contaminants.
meanings.sent3: The iodophor danced happily around the brewing tanks, making sure everything was spotless.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to cleanliness was as strong as iodophor in a winery.
meanings.sent5: The sparkling shine of the equipment after using iodophor was a testament to its effectiveness.
